commit.message:
Update the LLVM license mentioned in COPYRIGHT

LLVM has relicensed their codebase. Remove the old UIUC license text
from the LLVM section and include the licensing text used by LLVM
itself.

files.patch:
@@ -23,10 +23,252 @@ The Rust Project includes packages written by third parties.
 The following third party packages are included, and carry
 their own copyright notices and license terms:
 
-* LLVM. Code for this package is found in src/llvm-project.
